mapper.insert: SELECT TOA_ARCHIVE_FAVORITE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL INSERT INTO toa_archive_favorite(ID,collect_ID,FAVORITE_ID,FILE_TYPE,Physical_PATH,DM_NAME,DM_ALIAS,KM_CONTENT,KEY_WORDS,DM_TYPE,AUTHOR,KM_TITLE,CURRENT_VERSION,DM_SIZE,SEQ,WEIGHT,DM_CREATE_USER,KM_RELEASE_DATE,DELETE_FLAG,CREATE_USER,CREATE_USER_DEPT,CREATE_USER_ORG,CREATE_DATE,MODIFY_USER,MODIFY_DATE,EXT_DATE1,EXT_DATE2,EXT_NUM1,EXT_NUM2,EXT_NUM3,EXT_STR1,EXT_STR2,EXT_STR3,EXT_STR4,EXT_STR5) VALUES (#{id},#{collectId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{favoriteId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{physicalPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{kmContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{keyWords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{kmTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{currentVersion,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dmSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{seq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{dmCreateUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{kmReleaseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{deleteFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserDept,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createUserOrg,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modifyUser,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{extNum1,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extNum3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{extStr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extStr5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_favorite set
collect_ID = #{collectId},
FAVORITE_ID = #{favoriteId},
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType},
Physical_PATH = #{physicalPath},
DM_NAME = #{dmName},
DM_ALIAS = #{dmAlias},
KM_CONTENT = #{kmContent},
KEY_WORDS = #{keyWords},
DM_TYPE = #{dmType},
AUTHOR = #{author},
KM_TITLE = #{kmTitle},
CURRENT_VERSION = #{currentVersion},
DM_SIZE = #{dmSize},
SEQ = #{seq},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
DM_CREATE_USER = #{dmCreateUser},
KM_RELEASE_DATE = #{kmReleaseDate},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
